=======
CHANGES
=======

3.4.3 (unreleased)
------------------

- 

3.4.2 (2009-01-27)
------------------

- Substitute zope.app.zapi by direct calls to its wrapped apis. See bug 219302.

3.4.1 (2007-10-30)
------------------

- Removed deprecation warnings for ``ZopeMessageFactory`` and
  ``ZopeSecurityPolicy``.


3.4.0 (2007-10-11)
------------------

- Initial release independent of the main Zope tree.
